divs: Sighting DetailsI SPOKE WITH YOU 5 DAYS AGO TODAY , AND AM DEFINATELY NOT INTO HAVING SMOKE BLOWN UP MY ASS! AFTER FURTHER REVIEW OF MY PICS. I DISCOVERED A SECOND PICTURE! ADDITIONALLY, THE OTHER ODD NOTE IS THERE IS A RED AND A GREEN DOT IN MANY OF THE PICTURES ALONG WITH CRAFT. IT APPEARS AS IF THE RED DOT PICTURED IS FOLLOWING THE CRAFT? I ALSO TOLD YOU, THERE ARE MANY STREAKS OF LIGHT NOT WITNESSED BY ME OR MY FRIEND THAT ATTENDED THIS FUNCTION. I WAS BEGINNING TO THINK I WAS LOSING MY MIND UNTILL THE SECOND PIC VERIFIED MY SANITY. IF I HAD THE SOFTWARE TO ANALYZE THESE PICS I'D DO IT MYSELF WITHOUT YOUR AND DAVENPORTS BULLSHIT! SO , SINCE YA TOLD ME YOU WERE SENDING SOMEONE OUT ?? ITS AWFULL COINCINDENTAL THAT DAVENPORT AND I PLAYED E-TAG SHORTLY AFTER YOUR CALL? SO, I MAY NOT GET FAR BUT I AM CONTINUING MY OWN INVESTIGATION.. PERSONAL NOTE: YA KNOW, I RARELY GET OUT TO MANY FUNCTIONS DUE TO A FUCKED UP BACK FOR THE LAST 17 YEARS! I DONT NEED THIS BS AS I HAVE ENOUGH OF MY OWN PROBS. IF I DO FIND ANYTHING OUT YOU GUYS WILL BE THE LAST TO KNOW ! I HOPE YOUR NOT FUNDED BY THE TAX PAYER IN ANY WAY SHAPE OR FORM EITHER! I WILL NOTIFY THE PROPER AUTHORITIES ACCORDINGLY! MARK C. ZAWKO N2MAF MASTERMCZ7@AOL.COM (AS FAR AS THE RELEASE ON THE BOTTOM, IF IT ISNT SOMEONE "IN THE KNOW" ??? I DONT WANT SOME FUCKSTICK COMING HERE!!) WHEN MY INVESTIGATIONS ARE DONE MY REPORTS ON YOU AND DAVENPORT WILL BE FILED.
